GapFillInput.Title: The Title
GapFillInput.Instruction: Listen to the video of people talking about times in different countries and click on the correct answer.

Content.Question:
C: Excuse me! Excuse me! Is this the way to the Post Office? I need to post this. It’s very important.
PB1: It’s down there but it closes in about ten minutes … and you can't park in the town centre.
C: Right. Can I park here?
PB1: Yeah … there's a machine over there.
C: Great. Thanks.
PB1: No problem.
C: Excuse me!! Have you got any change?
PB2: What do you need?
C: Pound coins.
PB2: Just a minute.
C: Thanks a lot.
